title: Main Building
name: Main Building
description:
Students successfully penetrated the UK Main administration building in 2000 as part of a series of protests against the university's habit of purchasing athletic apparel produced in oversease sweatshops. 

The action culminated in 14 students being arrested, on campus, during the day, for tresspassing. Charges were pressed by President Wethington.

Unfortunately, their actions were unsuccessful and the university did not create any lasting policy to deal with the issue of sweatshop labor.
